description.oldValue: ,Configure Data Loss Prevention policies to enable policy tips for emails with sensitivity labels.
description.newValue: ,Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.
